# UI CMS support

## CMS Only

| Name            | Types |
| --------------- | ----- |
| CTA             | A,B,C |
| Error Pages     | A,B   |
| Generic Content | A,B   |
| Product Data    | C     |
| Shortcuts       | A     |
| Testimonial     | A,B   |
| Usps            | A,B,C |

## CMS Support

| Name               | Types   |
| ------------------ | ------- |
| Accordion          | A       |
| Banners            | A,B,C,D |
| Categories         | A,B     |
| Order Confirmation | A       |
